title: Novel pyridine isonicotinoyl hydrazone derivative: synthesis, complexation and investigation for decontamination of DR-81 from wastewater
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,30924-30937
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05731G, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Mohamed A. Ahmed, Eslam Salama, M. H. H. Mahmoud, Mohamed Ebaid, Mohamed A. Khalifa
Herein, novel aroylhydrazone (E/Z)-N′-((3-methylpyridin-2-yl)methylene)isonicotinohydrazide ligand (MPIH) 3 and its Zn(II)-MPIH complex 4 were synthesized and investigated to adsorb direct red 81 dye (DR-81) from aqueous media.
